Curriculum vitae

My name is Lorenzo Celli, I am a computer scientist mainly interested in computer graphics. I was born and raised in Bologna, Italy, where I currently live and work.

Work experience
devDept Software C# developer
2020 - present
DevDept software is a small software company based in Bologna, Italy that creates a CAD framework for .NET using C#. I joined the company as a working student two years ago and have had the opportunity to work on various projects, including CNC simulators and tessellation algorithms.
ECMWF Python developer
2019
During April 2019 I took part, with the help of CINECA and CNR, to the summer of weather code, a programme run by ECMWF (European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts) to develop innovative, open-source software. I had the oppurtunity to work with ECMWF again in November 2019, this time to create some animations that were displayed at the annual AGU (American Geophysical Union) meeting.
CINECA Python developer
2018
During and after high school, I worked as an intern for CINECA (the largest Italian comnputing centre) as a Python programmer. I have helped develop an add-on for Blender that allows integrations with the scientific visualization library VTK.
Chialab Web developer
2018
Chialab, is a graphic design studio based in Bologna. I worked there as an intern for a few months during the summer in 2018 and 2019, mainly working as a web developer on two web applications that were never released.
